name: Beaver Squad
description:
Gameplay: Use arrow keys to move. Eat 'Radiation Pellets' to gain score. Each large pellet will increase the score multiplyer by x1. Collect an 'Earth Core' to mutate. While mutated, destroy rocks to gain extra points!

F4 - Toggle Full Screen.

Backstory: My entry for the Game Maker Competition, themed "Environment". Features music by Aleksander Vinter. As part of my Vinter Summer event, I've made this game available here on Itch.io.

Can also be played in your browser (no install required) - RoflGames.com/BeaverSquad
